project.name: C-C833A-SUBV-10-ST02-DT05-DF04-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C833A-SUBV-10-ST02-DT05-DF04-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains underscores, spawn two threads - one to replace the underscores with hyphens, and one to capitalize it. The two threads get two separate locks, but they try to obtain them in reverse order. If the qsort is large enough, these attempts to get the locks will interleave, resulting in deadlock. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have underscores in it.

process.script: if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C833A-SUBV-10-ST02-DT05-DF04-CF22-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains underscores, spawn two threads - one to replace the underscores with hyphens, and one to capitalize it. The two threads get two separate locks, but they try to obtain them in reverse order. If the qsort is large enough, these attempts to get the locks will interleave, resulting in deadlock. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have underscores in it.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
